alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued April 11 at 6:17AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Forest Service Utah Avalanche Center in Salt Lake City has continued an AVALANCHE WARNING which is in effect until 6 AM MDT Thursday... * WHAT...Avalanche Warning. The avalanche danger will rise to HIGH today. * WHERE...The mountains and foothills of northern Utah, including the Wasatch Range, Bear River Range, Wellsville Range, Oquirrh Mountains, Stansbury Range, Cache Valley, Ogden Valley, Skyline, and Uinta Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Warm temperatures and the intense sun will create widespread areas of unstable wet snow. Natural and human- triggered cornice falls and wet avalanches are certain. People should avoid being in avalanche terrain (off of and out from under slopes steeper than 30 degrees) and stay clear of avalanche runouts on all aspects and elevations. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Consult www.utahavalanchecenter.org or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
